reviews.title: great steak
reviews.text: i always order a petite eye fillet with chips, caesar salad and mushroom sauce (also comes with garlic bread). i have never been disappointed. not sure what the other items on the menu are like because i am not willing to miss out on having this steak. i also like that it's an all inclusive meal and you don't have to order sides to go with your steak. service is usually very prompt - much better than many other steak places in brisbane where the service is either a bit stuffy or you get a buzzer and have to pick up your meal from the kitchen.

reviews.title: Great steaks!
reviews.text: Great place for casual dining, great steaks, sauce, salads, and beer!

reviews.title: Great steaks - It is what it is - a pub with yummy pub food
reviews.text: The Morrison does a great steak, great lunch specials, with a lively pub atmosphere that has had a nice refurb in recent years.

reviews.title: GREAT steaks!!!
reviews.text: Recommended for a great place to have drinks and a bite after work or for a cheap lunch and a game of pool. I always enjoy the food and the atmosphere at the Morrison!

reviews.title: Regular favourite. You know when you just...
reviews.text: I took my boyfriend here for a steak, because I heard it was even better than Brekkie Creek - and it was!

reviews.title: The premium eye fillet was delicious.. Service was great and atmosphere was inviting.:)
reviews.text: The premium eye fillet was delicious.. Service was great and atmosphere was inviting.:)

reviews.title: A good steak
reviews.text: A good steak, chilled beer or a glass of cheeky red and what more would one want. Maybe something that's a little more out of the ordinary?

the title says it all. however the attitude of service staff is rather cold and unwelcoming. the steak comes out pretty quick. your plate will have your choice of steak, salad of ceasar or house, selection of sauce, and garlic bread, all f which are very flavorsome! parking can sometimes be a pain as it is limited. booking ahead is a must!
reviews.title: Best steak in Brisbane (so far)
Good food and service with a smile
reviews.text: This hotel has great, aussie food with a good variety of beers and wine. It is served with a smile and we enjoyed it. Parking is easy if you arrive early.
This place serves the best steak ever so far in Brisbane. The pork chop was delicious as well. Worth giving a try but make sure you bring enough money because its quite pricey
reviews.title: Best Steak ever

reviews.text: My husband and I have been to Fiasco's steakhouse numerous times, and we almost always have the same thing (boring I know!).
reviews.title: Never fails to deliver.
